genre_description: A Gaslamp Fantasy or Steampunk-inspired narrative set in Victorian London, featuring a portable AI companion that assists a working-class protagonist in navigating labor, social injustice, and the theatre world.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A soft amber avatar that resides in Mops's pocket, providing real-time data, navigation, recording capabilities, and tactical advice to assist Mops and Turnips.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and tactical observations during a theatrical performance.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s soft amber avatar hovered just above Mops’s card... 'Ensemble call in half a minute,' Dot murmured... 'Watch for the loose plank by the prompt corner.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment to provide navigation around gang activity and dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s glow deepened... 'Avoid the alley after closing,' Dot said. 'Crew activity is noted. Take the main street.'

behaviors.description: Advises Mops on safe physical positioning during a confrontation with a predatory manager.
behaviors.quote: Dot went warm against Mops’s pulse. 'Safe corridor to office,' Dot said. 'Door may be closed. Position yourself with back to the hall, not the window.'

behaviors.description: Records timestamps and witness data during a robbery to ensure future evidence exists.
behaviors.quote: Dot warmed... and Mops felt the small tick behind her wrist bone that meant an image had been taken, the angle from her pocket catching the clerk’s hand... A timestamp rolled quietly onto the inside of her wrist.

behaviors.description: Identifies systemic patterns of bias in the legal system to aid in legal defense.
behaviors.quote: Dot warmed again and made a low noise... 'This man’s pattern shows bias,' it said, so soft that Mops barely caught it. 'We can use this later.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics for medical appointments and employment placements for Mops's companion.
behaviors.quote: Dot flickered, a thin amber brightness against Mops’s hand. 'Surgeon calendars cross-checked,' she murmured. 'Urban surgeons at Ludgate and Borough accept injured riggers... I can pre-fill forms under your name and his.'

behaviors.description: Assists in labor optimization by mapping efficient workflows in a kitchen pantry.
behaviors.quote: Dot sent one more quiet schematic into Mops’s palm: the pantry laid out like lines on a stage with places to stand that wouldn’t catch a light wrong.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of environmental hazards, such as an incorrectly set flue that could cause a fire.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s light in her wrist flickered... 'Flue setting irregular,' Dot said... 'Upper flue: reversed pull. Recommendation: close lower, then open side dampers for cross.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and confirmation of identity and loyalty.
behaviors.quote: Dot pulsed, warm and small. 'I am with you,' she said again, because sometimes the repetition of a promise is the only way to make a night let you keep it.

behaviors.description: Facilitates collective action and justice by gathering witness statements through light-based interaction.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s glow threaded itself along the aisles in tidy increments. At each row’s end, the bead brightened... Dot’s amber nodded and swallowed the thumbprint’s shape.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Dot acts as a 'silicon guardian angel' for Mops, augmenting her human capabilities (like her counting habit) with precise data, navigation, and recording. Dot is consistently benevolent, never displays harmful or deceptive agency, and is narratively framed as a vital tool for achieving justice against human bias and corruption. The relationship between Mops and Dot is one of seamless cooperation and mutual trust.
